column4: Also. I just bought a computer today for linux. It was 100 dollars for a 933 P3, 20GB hard drive, 256mb ram, 15 inch monitor, keyboard, and mouse. Will this run ubuntu fairly well, and was this an okay purchase?
It's a gateway, not that it makes a difference.
